Name: ATK Up Y
Description: Increases ATK by 40%, CRIT RATE by 40%, and CRIT DMG by 20%.

Name: Amplification
Description: Increases ATK and ARTS by 100%. Additional grants the user 1 extra TURN.

Name: Caffeine Overload
Description: Decreases MAX HP and DEF by 30% and RES by 10%, but grants the user 2 extra TURNS and SKILL POINTS.

Name: Arts Up B
Description: Increases ARTS by 30% and RES by 5%.

Name: Chill
Description: Increases DEF by 15%, ARTS by 20%, and RES by 5%.

Name: Protection Y
Description: Increases MAX HP by 20%, DEF by 20%, and RES by 5%.

Name: Arts Up Y
Description: Increases ARTS by 45%, RES by 10%, and CRIT RATE by 20%.

Name: Honey Goodness
Description: Increases ARTS by 30% and RES by 15%.

Name: Matchalicious
Description: Increases MAX HP, ATK, and ARTS by 5%.

Name: Impenetrable Barrier
Description: Increases DEF by 200% and RES by 89%.

Name: Protection A
Description: Increases MAX HP by 10% and DEF by 5%.

Name: ATK Up A
Description: Increases ATK by 10% and CRIT RATE by 20%.

Name: Restoration Y
Description: Heals 5% of MAX HP and Increases MAX HP by 10%.

Name: Arts Up A
Description: Increases ARTS by 15% and RES by 3%.

Name: Restoration B
Description: Heals 25% of MAX HP.

Name: Orange Scent
Description: Increases ARTS by 10% and RES by 5%.

Name: ATK Up B
Description: Increases ATK by 25% and CRIT RATE by 30%.

Name: Protection B
Description: Increases MAX HP by 15% and DEF by 10%.

Name: Comfort
Description: Decreases MAX HP by 20%, but increases CRIT RATE by 20% and CRIT DMG by 40%.

Name: Sugar Rush
Description: Increases ATK and ARTS by 20%. Furthermore, increases CRIT RATE by 20%, but decreases CRIT DMG by 40%.

Name: Resurgence
Description: Grants the the player 1 extra TURN and SKILL POINT.

Name: Restoration A
Description: Heals 15% of MAX HP.

Name: Land of Dreams
Description: Increases ATK and ARTS by 20%, and DEF by 15%.

Name: Leafy Green
Description: Increases CRIT RATE by 30% and CRIT DMG by 50%.

Name: Berry Blast
Description: Increases ATK by 30%, but decreases DEF by 20% and RES by 5%.

Name: Explorangsion
Description: Increases ATK by 100% and CRIT RATE by 100%.

Name: Apple Core
Description: Increases MAX HP by 10% and heals 2% of MAX HP every turn.

Name: Pear Stem
Description: Decreases starting SKILL POINTS by 2, but increases DEF by 13%, ARTS by 7%, and CRIT DMG by 40%.

Name: Strawberry Seed
Description: Increases DEF by 30% and CRIT Rate by 35%, but decreases ATK by 5%.

Name: Grapevine
Description: Decreases MAX HP by 30%, but grants 2 extra TURNS and an increase of intellect by 20.

Name: Dekopeel
Description: Decreases MAX HP by 40%, but restores 15% of MAX HP every turn and increases DEF by 20% and RES by 5%.

Name: Dried Mango
Description: Increases ATK and ARTS by 8%, CRIT RATE by 5%, and CRIT DMG by 15%, but consumes 3% of MAX HP every turn.

Name: Pineapple Crown
Description: Increases MAX HP and CRIT RATE by 15%, but decreases CRIT DMG by 15%. Consumes 4% of MAX HP every turn.

Name: Durian Thorn
Description: Increases ARTS by 50%, but decreases ATK by 30%, DEF by 20%, and CRIT DMG by 20%.

Name: Apple a Day keeps the Doctor Away
Description: Heals 5% of MAX HP every turn.

Name: Crispy
Description: Increases CRIT DMG by 25% every turn.

Name: Seedless
Description: Decreases DEF for every attack.

Name: Grape Burst
Description: Every 4 attacks gain an additional TURN.

Name: Imposter
Description: Copies enemy's base stats.

Name: Rage
Description: If HP is lowered below 50% ATK is increased every turn.

Name: Thorns
Description: Every attack inflicts the enemy with a DoT effect.

Name: Berserk
Description: Increases ATK by 3% of damage taken.

Name: Shell
Description: ATK and DEF increases every turn.

Name: Attack Down
Description: Decrease ATK by 10%.

Name: Arts Down
Description: Decrease ARTS by 10%.

Name: Crit Damage Down
Description: Decrease CRIT DMG by 10%.

Name: Crit Rate Down
Description: Decrease CRIT RATE by 10%.

Name: Defense Down
Description: Decrease DEF by 10%.

Name: Resistance Down
Description: Decrease RES by 10%.

Name: Sting
Description: This effect deals a base amount of damage to you at the end of your turn.

Name: Bleed
Description: This effect deals a percent amount of damage to you at the end of your turn.
